title: ISWC 2012 Closing and Awards

David Huynh, Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory (CSAIL), Massachusetts Institute of Technology, MIT
Tania Tudorache, Stanford Center for Biomedical Informatics Research
Chris Welty, IBM Thomas J. Watson Research Center
